q: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Steven Tyler . Outside of the music industry, no one in the United States knew who Simon Cowell was until he started making nasty comments during the first season promotions for the show, he says.`` Being mean was what made him a celebrity. But Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are already celebrities. They have their cultural equity to protect.'' For Toby Young , it's no accident that

`` In addition to creating the jobs of the future, clean energy benefits the U.S. economy by ultimately making energy costs more affordable for consumers- especially if their dollars stay in America,'' Sergio Marchionne said. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, and we are excited to partner with the EPA to push forward on this track. EPA's hydraulic hybrid technology, developed in the agency's lab in Ann Arbor, Michigan, is coming into use in large delivery and refuse trucks across the country. the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Denver Nuggets 108-97 Tuesday night in Allen Iverson 's first game against his former team. It was weird to see him wearing a white jersey and we're wearing black,'' Kyle Korver said. I said to one of our coaches that it is so weird to see him on the other side. It wasn't really a good feeling at all. He's a great player and he meant a lot to Philadelphia. Allen Iverson scored 30 points on 10-of-24 shooting before getting tossed for his second technical with 1:44 remaining. Afterward, he said the loss disappointed him because he feels the Nuggets are the better team. Allen Iverson 's best shots

Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wants you to know that the Xbox 360`` isn't a gaming console.'' Rather, Steve Ballmer believes the 360- along with Kinect- acts as a complete family entertainment center. It's a place to socialize. It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller.
